story: Bellal Mohamed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Facebook API /me/posts return only 275 post as limit
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: When I make a GET request to /me/posts to get posts on the profile and set the limit to 1000 I only get 275 post as max. I'm sure that there is more than 1000 post not only 275. is 275 the max limi...

data.message: I've checked the ngFacebook it seems to a module encapsulating graph api routine functions like connection and caching but it does not impose limits on the payload can you check your Graph API query to check for any hidden limitation and also Facebook don't offer much information about the /me edge but they are saying it a special edge which may imply there is some hidden limitation to querying by user_id and check the result
pagination , even you set limit 2000 you got same count
